name: Restitch
summary: You've learned how to sew even the most terrible tears and wounds together.
description:
You've learned how to sew even the most terrible tears and wounds together. You can cast regenerate as a 7th-level arcane innate spell once per day.Traits

Poppet: Small constructs originally designed to serve as companions or servants. They occasionally gain a greater spark of life, transforming them into independent, sapient creatures.
